projects.name: NFT Haven
projects.details: • DApp serving for NFT-generation & minting, available for trading on OpenSea marketplace.• Lightning NFT Network - Mint NFTs in blazing speed across multiple ecosystems (Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon)• Multi-chain minting is now made easy all in one place !

projects.name: Diablo Music App
projects.details: Minimalistic Music Player with a dark UI especially-curated for the nocturnal. Utilises Firebase-authenticated login. Doubles as local & online music player
